Additional information

Released on: 2013-06-28
Temporal coverage: 2012-01-01 - 2013-01-01
Spatial coverage: England
Frequency of updates: One off

Rights Statement

  • Data Licence: Open Data Commons Attribution License
  • Content Licence: Creative Commons Attribution 2.0 UK: England & Wales

When re-using this data please preserve the following copyright notice: "Data provided by Zopa, Funding Circle and RateSetter".

If you would like to attribute your use of this dataset, please use a link similar to the following:

Open Data Institute.

  • self-certified
